patterns: Can I know how to trace
responses: On home screen, there is first button 'Trace'. Tap that button and on the next page there is a button labeled Scan. Scan the Data Matrix or GS-128 code to get the Tracing Data against that Code.

patterns: Can I know how to track
How tracking is done in this app
responses: On the home screen, you see two buttons. The 1st button is named Trace and the 2nd button bellow Trace is Track. To Track your item, you need to tap the track button and on the next screen there is a text box asking for tracking ID. Enter your Tracking ID to get the tracking results.
